Child & Family Well-Being Services
Report Child Abuse or Neglect
Report suspected child abuse or neglect at 858-560-2191 24 hours a
 day, seven days a week.
Within the State of California, call toll free 1(800) 344-6000.
MANDATED REPORTERS:  You can now self-register and submit
non-urgent
child abuse reports through our
online
 Mandated Reporter Application
.  For technical help, please
 access our
MRA
 Training Video
or contact our Child Abuse Hotline at the number
 listed above.
When we get a report, a social worker evaluates the report to
 determine if the child is at risk. The risk factors you report help us
 decide if we investigate and if so, how soon we investigate The
 investigation could be within 24 hours,10 days, or simply a referral
 to a community agency without an investigation.
If you:
are concerned about a child’s safety,
are a parent
 afraid you may harm your child,
are a child or youth who
 believes you are being abused, call the Hotline. We can provide
 resources for additional help.
If you are a Mandated Reporter (as identified by law), you must
 contact authorities if you suspect or are told about child abuse.
 Click this link to see the
Mandated
 Reporter Training
.
